meanings.definition: A person who is a pioneer in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: The pioner of space exploration made history with their groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent2: The pioner of the new technology revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent3: The pioner of the baking world created a cake that was out of this world!
meanings.sent4: She was a true pioner, blazing a trail for others to follow in the art world.
meanings.sent5: The pioner's legacy inspired generations to pursue innovation and progress.

meanings.definition: To act as a pioneer; to open up or prepare (a way, settlement, etc.) for others to follow.
meanings.sent1: They decided to pioner the uncharted territory, clearing the path for future explorers.
meanings.sent2: The group worked together to pioner a new approach to solving the problem.
meanings.sent3: He wanted to pioner a new hiking trail through the dense forest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to pioner a sustainable lifestyle set an example for the community.
meanings.sent5: The team's effort to pioner a faster way to communicate was met with success.
